name: Java Web Start File
summary: Learn about .JNP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: JNLP files contain information such as the remote address of the Java program (.JAR file) and the initial class to be run. They are saved in an .XML format and can be viewed or edited with a text editor.
NOTE: The ".jnp" file extension is a three-letter alternative to the more common .JNLP file extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
